椵字的基本解释

椵
jiǎ
古书上说的一种树，柚子一类，果实大如盂，皮很厚，可以吃。

椵
jiā
古代系犬的器具。
古同“枷”，旧时套在脖子上的刑具。

椵字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiǎ］
［《廣韻》古疋切，上馬，見。］
果木名。
[②]［jiā］
［《集韻》居牙切，平麻，見。］
古时枷狗之具。
[③]［duàn］
同“椴1”。

椵字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　椵； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页537第24
【唐韻】古雅切【集韻】【韻會】舉下切，?音檟。【說文】木可作牀几。【爾雅·釋木】櫠椴。【註】柚屬也。子大如盂，皮厚二三寸，中似枳，食之少味。　又【集韻】居迓切，音駕。【博雅】杙也，所以舉物。　又【類篇】居牙切，音加。囚械。

椵字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
椵字的起名意思

古书上说的一种树。

grapefruit
Basic explanation of words
grapefruit
jiǎ
A kind of tree mentioned in ancient books, like grapefruit, has a fruit as big as a glen with a thick skin and can be eaten.
grapefruit
jiā
Ancient dog equipment.
Ancient Tong "sail", the old instrument of torture worn around the neck.
grapefruit
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jiǎ］
["Guangyun" ancient 疋切, get on the horse, see you. ]
Fruit tree name.
[②]［jiā］
["Jiyun" is cut in teeth, plain hemp, see. ]
The equipment of yelling dogs in ancient times.
[③]［duàn］
Same as "Linden 1".
grapefruit
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　椵; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 537 24
[Tang Yun] Ancient and elegant cut [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] Lift down and cut,? Yin Chu. [Said the text] Wood can be used as a bed table. 【Erya·Shimu】Tilia. [Note] Pomelo is also a genus. The size is as big as a pan, the skin is two to three inches thick, the middle is like aurantium, with little food and taste.　[Jiyun] Jue cut, sound driving. [Bo Ya] Yeah, so I lift things up.　[Classes] Cut the teeth, add sound. Prison weapon.
grapefruit

grapefruit
Name meaning
A kind of tree mentioned in ancient books.
jiǎ, jiā
сущ.
1) jiǎ дерево из рода помпельмус (годное на столярные работы)
2) jiā * ошейник
